subject: Pixi <> quick feedback
description_text:
Pixi <> quick feedback 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Feedback 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Hi SIMSONN, I’m Geon from Pixi Order Printer. We’ve worked hard to give you a best-in-class product with great support, and I’d love your honest take. Is there something missing? If anything feels clunky— template edits, auto-printing, Integration, or Flow triggers—I'd love to hear it. We're shipping huge updates and can prioritize what's blocking you. What’s the one thing in Pixi that slows you down right now? A quick reply is perfect. – Geon, Pixi Thanks so much for trusting us :) 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Unsubscribe
